short_summary: Notification of Proposed Procurement for SA E60HS-19BCKH Skid Steer Loader group 2 configuration D
description: This notification is for procurement of one (1) Skid Steer Loader Category 2 Configuration D through SA E60HS-19BCKH. Bidders must have a Supply Arrangement under Request (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A to be eligible. Delivery of the requirement is necessary with the earliest available delivery date. This contract shall be valid from contract award date to March 1, 2025.
full_summary: ### Title: Solicitation Number: 30005843 Skid Steer Loader Category 2 Configuration D ### Background and Objectives: Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a proposal to supply one (1) Skid Steer Loader Category 2 Configuration D through the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HS-19BCKH. ### Technical Specifications: * Contract term: July 22, 2024, to March 01, 2025. * Delivery must be made as soon as possible, but no later than March 01, 2025. * The vehicle shall be a Skid Steer Loader Category 2 Configuration D. ### Trade Agreements: This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). ### Conditions of Tender: This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-19BCKH/A. ### Methods of Accommodating Special Needs: Suppliers may submit inquiries regarding special needs to Carina Della Valle, Contracting Authority, by phone at (343) 542-9691, or via email at [Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca). All inquiries shall be addressed to this person. ### Deposit for Tender Plans and Drawings: No separate fees or deposit is required for the tender documentation. ### Bidding Confidentiality: The information provided to the bidders is confidential and shall not be revealed to any third party. ### Postal Address For Tender Submission: Solicitation Number: 30005843 at the following address: Finnish Labour Service Jennarintie 22 09240 LLäN FINLAND.
